Controls.Description: Setting to ensure that bot authenticates users to various identity providers such as AAD (Azure Active Directory), GitHub etc.
Controls.Rationale: Bot authentication capabilities that authenticates users to various identity providers such as AAD (Azure Active Directory), GitHub, Uber.
Controls.Recommendation: Add authentication to your bot. Refer: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/bot-service/bot-builder-tutorial-authentication?view=azure-bot-service-3.0#to-register-an-aad-v2-application

Controls.Description: Multiple channels configured between the Bot and communication apps.
Controls.Rationale: Configure a bot to connect to the channels. The channels include many popular services, such as Cortana, Facebook Messenger, Kik, and Slack, as well as several others.

Controls.Description: Bot Service API must only be accessible over HTTPS
Controls.Rationale: Use of HTTPS ensures server/service authentication and protects data in transit from network layer eavesdropping attacks.
Controls.Recommendation: Make Web App linked to Bot Service to use Https using command 'Set-AzureRmResource -ResourceName '<WebAppName>' -ResourceGroupName '<RGName>' -ResourceType 'Microsoft.Web/sites' -Properties @{httpsOnly='true'} -Force '. Run 'Get-Help Set-AzureRmResource -full' for more help.

Controls.Description: Ensure to use own storage adapter instead of Bot Framework State Service API.
Controls.Rationale: Using this feature ensures that sensitive data is stored encrypted at rest. This minimizes the risk of data loss from physical theft and also helps meet regulatory compliance requirements.
Controls.Recommendation: Refer https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/bot-service/dotnet/bot-builder-dotnet-state for implementing state for Bot Service.

Controls.Description: Secrets in Bot Service must be handled properly.
Controls.Rationale: Keeping secrets such as passwords, keys, etc. in clear text can lead to easy compromise at various avenues during an application's lifecycle.
Controls.Recommendation: It is recommended to handle the secrets properly.

Controls.Description: Make sure important activities and events during Bot interactions are logged.
Controls.Rationale: Analytics can be useful to detect unusual usage behavior patterns.
Controls.Recommendation: Follow https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/bot-service/bot-service-manage-analytics?view=azure-bot-service-3.0 for configuring Application Insight with Bot Service.
